meanings.definition: To create a representation or imitation of something.
meanings.sent1: She modeled a clay figure in art class.
meanings.sent2: The architect modeled the new building after a famous landmark.
meanings.sent3: The children modeled their playdough animals after the zoo animals they saw.
meanings.sent4: Her painting perfectly modeled the sunset over the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The sculptor skillfully modeled the statue out of marble.

meanings.definition: To serve as a model or example for others.
meanings.sent1: The teacher modeled how to solve the math problem on the board.
meanings.sent2: His hard work and dedication modeled good behavior for his peers.
meanings.sent3: The comedian modeled how not to tell a joke by making everyone groan.
meanings.sent4: The leader modeled courage by facing challenges head-on.
meanings.sent5: The athlete modeled perseverance by never giving up during the race.
